_comment: Australian immigration-related legislation. sections[] is populated by scripts/download_legislations.py (scrapes AustLII). Run that script to populate full text.

legislations.title: Migration Act 1958
legislations.description: The primary legislation governing migration to, from and within Australia. Establishes visa framework, deportation procedures, and rights of non-citizens.

legislations.title: Migration Regulations 1994
legislations.description: Subordinate legislation made under the Migration Act 1958. Sets out detailed criteria for visa applications, processing, and administrative decisions.

legislations.title: Australian Citizenship Act 2007
legislations.description: Governs the acquisition, loss, and cessation of Australian citizenship. Establishes pathways to citizenship and criteria for maintaining citizenship status.

legislations.title: Australian Border Force Act 2015
legislations.description: Establishes the Australian Border Force (ABF) and its functions. Governs border enforcement, customs, and immigration compliance operations.

legislations.title: Administrative Review Tribunal Act 2024
legislations.description: Establishes the Administrative Review Tribunal (ART), replacing the AAT from October 2024 for merits review of migration and other administrative decisions.

legislations.title: Administrative Appeals Tribunal Act 1975
legislations.description: Historical legislation governing the Administrative Appeals Tribunal (AAT), predecessor to the ART (2000â€“2024). Relevant for older immigration case law.
